title: Is there any way to uninstall League without having to delete many/alot of files?
body:
I have very slow internet and am loath to completely have to download it all again (it will take about 6 or 7 hours). 

The reason I need to re-install league is because I am trying to fix an issue with my launcher, which opens up fine, but upon hitting the "launch" button, the login screen does not show up many of the times. The processes show they are there but the client itself isn't. Terminating the processes and trying again, or trying to open it up again and getting the "another instance is already running" and restarting it that way don't work.

The only way I can log on is by restarting my entire computer, or by waiting about 30 minutes to an hour with the patcher open, then hitting launch.

I've already tried repairing my client multiple times but to no help, so now I want to reinstall League but can't deal with deleting it entirely.

replies.body:
I don't feel like the reinstall will fix this issue. These types of issues are commonly caused by either permissions issues or a poor connection to our servers. I'd recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure it isn't caused by the latter. 

Let me know if this helped.
